price: 他〔安拉〕说：“在你〔离别〕之后，我确已考验你的宗族，撒米里已使他们迷误了。”
arabic: قَالَ فَإِنَّا قَدۡ فَتَنَّا قَوۡمَكَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِكَ وَأَضَلَّهُمُ ٱلسَّامِرِيُّ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: qāla fa-innā qad fatannā qawmaka min baʿdika wa-aḍallahumu al-sāmiriyu
